title: 1.13如何用execute的store result把某个值赋到末影水晶的BeanTarget上?
author: Water_Bell
txt_content: 试了很多次，就是无法在命令里表示BeamTarget的某个子项，求大佬解决，谢谢

replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 SPGoding 于 2018-8-6 20:49 编辑 

你命令怎么写的

execute store result entity @e[limit=1,type=end_crystal] BeamTarget.X int 1 run data get entity @p Pos[0]

replies.author: Water_Bell
replies.txt_content:
SPGoding 发表于 2018-8-6 16:42
你命令怎么写的

execute store result entity @e[limit=1,type=end_crystal] BeamTarget.X int 1 run data ...
execute at @e[type=minecraft:end_crystal] store result entity @e[type=minecraft:end_crystal,limit=1 BeamTarget int 1 run data get entity @e[distance=..10,limit=1] Pos[0] 1 红色的地方改了很多次，完全不知道如何表示啊
